projects.name: Diwali Sales Analysis
projects.description: Exploratory Data Analysis. Employed VScode for efficient Python development, pandas for streamlined data manipulation, and matplotlib/seaborn for rapid data visualization, reducing project completion time by 20%. Performed data cleaning and manipulation, resulting in a 95% reduction in missing values and a 10% increase in data accuracy. Analyzed sales data to identify best-selling products, uncovering a previously unrecognized trend in demand for category Food products.

projects.name: Hybrid YOLOv8-LLM System for Aerial Garbage Detection
projects.description: This cutting-edge project aims to leverage the power of deep learning models, specifically YOLOv8 and LLM, to detect and classify garbage from aerial images with an impressive 98% accuracy in the particular dataset.

projects.name: Security Attacks and Services for Educational Purposes
projects.description: Co-authored a cybersecurity chapter for an academic project, delving into 7 categories of cyberattacks. Literature review conducted using academic databases accessed through Google Scholar.

experiences.description: Developed and implemented data analysis projects from beginner to advanced levels, gaining experience in data cleaning, manipulation, and visualization. Utilized data analysis tools such as Python and SQL to analyze and interpret data set.

Creating and executing computer vision models for the purposes of matching styles and identifying individual hairstyles in images. Using Python, TensorFlow as the mechanics of tool kits to process the images efficiently.
